DOC.brief_summary: Using 2x2 complete factorial design , approximately 140 obese men woman may may type 2 diabetes randomize one two condition ( 70 condition ) : ( ) high fiber diet , ( b ) low-carbohydrate diet . Participants instruct follow assign diet 1 year . Outcome measure interest include participant ' BMI , waist circumference , blood lipid ( total , HDL , LDL cholesterol , triglyceride ) , C-reactive protein , gastrointestinal peptide . Participants recruit Loma Linda San Bernardino city area southern California .
DOC.brief_title: A Very High Fiber Diet Versus Low-carbohydrate Diet Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: BMI 30.042.0 kg/m2 Englishspeaking Pregnancy Lactation Acute chronic infection Type 1 diabetes Participation another trial Active cancer Currently use Byetta Currently weight loss medication Weight loss 4 lb . within last 3 month Vegan Active eat disorder Gastrointestinal problem may worsen high fiber intake
